comments: This is a terrific course and Prof. David Holland is a superb teacher. The subject material is fascinating and I would wholly recommend this class to anyone interested in religion or American studies. It is surely not an easy course and there is a good deal of information to absorb for the exams, but the instructor is such a wonderful teacher and storyteller that it would be a shame to miss this course.
While I really enjoyed this course, I do believe that background in the field is extremely necessary to fully understand the subject material.

Lecture was like storytime twice a week - expert narratives from the articulate, funny David Holland - interspersed with great class discussions. The paper assignment was tough but necessitated reflection. Good to have background in Christian history but not necessary. Go to office hours with Travis!
